content: That's really helpful! I think I'll add some items from each category to create a diverse and engaging list. By the way, speaking of exploring the great outdoors, I took my niece to the Children's Museum for her birthday, where we spent the day exploring the interactive exhibits and playing with the hands-on displays. It was amazing to see how much she enjoyed the hands-on learning experience. Do you think a nature-themed scavenger hunt could be a good way to continue that type of learning experience in a more outdoor setting?
